author: Reuters Editorial
title: Saudi British Bank Reports Q1 Profit Of 1.04 Billion Riyals
text:
May 7 (Reuters) - SAUDI BRITISH BANK:
* Q1 NET PROFIT 1.04 BILLION RIYALS VERSUS 1.04 BILLION RIYALS YEAR AGO
* AS OF END-MARCH 2018, LOAN AND ADVANCES STAND AT 116.50 BILLION RIYALS, DOWN 2.51 PERCENT YEAR-ON-YEAR
* AS OF END-MARCH 2018 CUSTOMER DEPOSITS STAND AT 135.39 BILLION RIYALS, DOWN 4.36 PERCENT YEAR-ON-YEAR Source: ( bit.ly/2FSu3T5 )
